    • isNetwork

      public final boolean isNetwork()
      Returns:
      If the admins of this server are performing on a network/proxy.
      This setting is critical as certain data (ex. lastLogin timestamp of a user connection) will be updated on every local (ex. spigot) connection if this is set to false.
      Since:
      1.0.0
